= Color=

Class header file: [http://code.google.com/p/bwapi/source/browse/trunk/bwapi/include/BWAPI/Color.h# BWAPI/Color.h]

Starcraft uses a 256 color palette to render everything, so the colors we can use to draw shapes using BWAPI is limited to the colors available in the [#Palette Palette].

Methods:
  * Color(int id) - Create a color using the specified index from the Broodwar color [#Palette palette].
  * Color(int red, int green, int blue) - Create a color using the color in the [#Palette palette] that is closest to the RGB color specified.
  * int getID() - Return the index of the color in the color [#Palette palette].
  * int red() - Return the red component of the color.
  * int green() - Return the green component of the color.
  * int blue() - Return the blue component of the color.

=== Colors ===
While any color from the [#Palette palette] can be used, the following colors are available as short cuts:

  * Red
  * Green
  * Blue
  * Yellow
  * Cyan
  * Purple
  * Orange
  * Black
  * White
  * Grey

=== Palette ===
The 256 color palette used by Starcraft: BroodWar:

[http://imgur.com/RyPjC.png]

The two sets of pixels outlined in green are pixels that change color each frame, (cycle from left to right).

=== Text Color ===
Text color is used simply as an escape character.

"\x03 This is yellow text. \x06 This is red text."

x02 - Cyan
